>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/notification"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Enables the notification type specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["type"],"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Badges","RoomsActivity","DailyFeed","UsefullTips"],"type":"string","description":"[Badges - Badges, RoomsActivity - Rooms activity, DailyFeed - Daily feed, UsefullTips - Usefull tips]","example":"Badges"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Badges, 1 - Rooms activity, 2 - Daily feed, 3 - Usefull tips]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Badges","RoomsActivity","DailyFeed","UsefullTips"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Badges","Rooms activity","Daily feed","Usefull tips"]}],"description":"The notification type.","title":"NotificationType"},"isEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the specified notification type is enabled or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring notification settings.","title":"NotificationSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Notification settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Badges","RoomsActivity","DailyFeed","UsefullTips"],"type":"string","description":"[Badges - Badges, RoomsActivity - Rooms activity, DailyFeed - Daily feed, UsefullTips - Usefull tips]","example":"Badges"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Badges, 1 - Rooms activity, 2 - Daily feed, 3 - Usefull tips]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Badges","RoomsActivity","DailyFeed","UsefullTips"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Badges","Rooms activity","Daily feed","Usefull tips"]}],"description":"The notification type.","title":"NotificationType"},"isEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the notification type is enabled or not.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The notification settings parameters.","title":"NotificationSettingsDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"NotificationSettingsWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
